data.title: Major Literary Awards
data.meta_description:
Major Literary Awards - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Major literary awards around the world include:

The Costa Book Awards (formerly the Whitbread Book Awards) given to authors in Great Britain and Ireland; the Man Asian Literary Prize awarded to Asian writers; the Man Booker Prize awarded to Commonwealth authors; and the Pulitzer Prize awarded in the United States for journalism, literature, and music. Other international awards presented include the International IMPAC Dublin Literary Award, the Premio Miguel de Cervantes for Spanish language works, and the Neustadt International Prize for Literature. National literary prizes presented within countries include France's Prix Goncourt, Canada's Scotiabank Giller Prize, and the National Book Awards in the United States.
